notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.
ariaRetry: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
taskDescription:
Find the volume of the cylinder where the radius of the base is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>10</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mtext>cm</mtext>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">10\,\text{cm}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the height is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>5</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mtext>cm</mtext>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">5\,\text{cm}</annotation></semantics></math>.
